class.name: RenderSceneBuffersRD
class.brief_description: Render scene buffer implementation for the RenderingDevice based renderers.
class.description: This object manages all 3D rendering buffers for the rendering device based renderers. An instance of this object is created for every viewport that has 3D rendering enabled. All buffers are organized in [b]contexts[/b]. The default context is called [b]render_buffers[/b] and can contain amongst others the color buffer, depth buffer, velocity buffers, VRS density map and MSAA variants of these buffers. Buffers are only guaranteed to exist during rendering of the viewport. [b]Note:[/b] This is an internal rendering server object, do not instantiate this from script.

method.name: clear_context
method.description: Frees all buffers related to this context.

method.name: create_texture
method.description: Create a new texture with the given definition and cache this under the given name. Will return the existing texture if it already exists.

method.name: create_texture_from_format
method.description: Create a new texture using the given format and view and cache this under the given name. Will return the existing texture if it already exists.

method.name: create_texture_view
method.description: Create a new texture view for an existing texture and cache this under the given view_name. Will return the existing teture view if it already exists. Will error if the source texture doesn't exist.

method.name: get_color_layer
method.description: Returns the specified layer from the color texture we are rendering 3D content to. If [param msaa] is [code]true[/code] and MSAA is enabled, this returns the MSAA variant of the buffer.

method.name: get_color_texture
method.description: Returns the color texture we are rendering 3D content to. If multiview is used this will be a texture array with all views. If [param msaa] is [code]true[/code] and MSAA is enabled, this returns the MSAA variant of the buffer.

method.name: get_depth_layer
method.description: Returns the specified layer from the depth texture we are rendering 3D content to. If [param msaa] is [code]true[/code] and MSAA is enabled, this returns the MSAA variant of the buffer.

method.name: get_depth_texture
method.description: Returns the depth texture we are rendering 3D content to. If multiview is used this will be a texture array with all views. If [param msaa] is [code]true[/code] and MSAA is enabled, this returns the MSAA variant of the buffer.

method.name: get_fsr_sharpness
method.description: Returns the FSR sharpness value used while rendering the 3D content (if [method get_scaling_3d_mode] is an FSR mode).

method.name: get_internal_size
method.description: Returns the internal size of the render buffer (size before upscaling) with which textures are created by default.

method.name: get_msaa_3d
method.description: Returns the applied 3D MSAA mode for this viewport.

method.name: get_render_target
method.description: Returns the render target associated with this buffers object.

method.name: get_scaling_3d_mode
method.description: Returns the scaling mode used for upscaling.

method.name: get_screen_space_aa
method.description: Returns the screen-space antialiasing method applied.

method.name: get_target_size
method.description: Returns the target size of the render buffer (size after upscaling).

method.name: get_texture
method.description: Returns a cached texture with this name.

method.name: get_texture_format
method.description: Returns the texture format information with which a cached texture was created.

method.name: get_texture_samples
method.description: Returns the number of MSAA samples used.

method.name: get_texture_slice
method.description: Returns a specific slice (layer or mipmap) for a cached texture.

method.name: get_texture_slice_size
method.description: Returns the texture size of a given slice of a cached texture.

method.name: get_texture_slice_view
method.description: Returns a specific view of a slice (layer or mipmap) for a cached texture.

method.name: get_use_debanding
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if debanding is enabled.

method.name: get_use_taa
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if TAA is enabled.

method.name: get_velocity_layer
method.description: Returns the specified layer from the velocity texture we are rendering 3D content to.

method.name: get_velocity_texture
method.description: Returns the velocity texture we are rendering 3D content to. If multiview is used this will be a texture array with all views. If [param msaa] is [b]true[/b] and MSAA is enabled, this returns the MSAA variant of the buffer.

method.name: get_view_count
method.description: Returns the view count for the associated viewport.

method.name: has_texture
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a cached texture exists for this name.
